Class GreekInput

  • Object
    • GreekInput

  • public class GreekInput
extends Object
    This class is used to get input from keyboard according to a specified code page.
    Author:
    Marialena Toli

      static String getCodePage()
      This returns the code page to be used.

      This reads input from the keyboard using the given code page.

      This sets the code page to be used.

      • setCodepage

        public static void setCodepage(String cdpage)
        This sets the code page to be used.
        Parameters:
        cdpage - the code page to be used

      • getCodePage

        public static String getCodePage()
        This returns the code page to be used.
        Returns:
        the code page to be used

      • readLine

        public static String readLine()
        This reads input from the keyboard using the given code page.
        Returns:
        the input given from keyboard
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if given code page does not exist returns nothing
        IOException - if given input cannot be read returns nothing
